Config.Name: AppData Config Path
Config.Description: Container Path: /config

Config.Name: LetsEncrypt
Config.Description: Container Path: /etc/letsencrypt

Config.Name: Transcripts
Config.Description: Container Path: /usr/share/jitsi-meet/transcripts

Config.Name: ENABLE_AUTH
Config.Description: Enable authentication: 0 OR 1

Config.Name: ENABLE_GUESTS
Config.Description: Enable guest access: 0 OR 1

Config.Name: ENABLE_LETSENCRYPT
Config.Description: Enable Let's Encrypt certificate generation: 0 OR 1

Config.Name: ENABLE_HTTP_REDIRECT
Config.Description: Redirect HTTP traffic to HTTPS (necessary for Let's Encrypt): 0 OR 1

Config.Name: ENABLE_TRANSCRIPTIONS
Config.Description: Enable Jigasi transcription in a conference

Config.Name: DISABLE_HTTPS
Config.Description: Handle TLS connections outside of this setup

Config.Name: JICOFO_AUTH_USER
Config.Description: XMPP user for Jicofo client connections

Config.Name: LETSENCRYPT_DOMAIN
Config.Description: Domain for which to generate the certificate

Config.Name: LETSENCRYPT_EMAIL
Config.Description: E-Mail for receiving important account notifications (mandatory)

Config.Name: PUBLIC_URL
Config.Description: Public URL for the web service

Config.Name: XMPP_DOMAIN
Config.Description: Internal XMPP domain

Config.Name: XMPP_BOSH_URL_BASE
Config.Description: Internal XMPP server URL for BOSH module

Config.Name: XMPP_GUEST_DOMAIN
Config.Description: XMPP domain for unauthenticated users

Config.Name: XMPP_MUC_DOMAIN
Config.Description: XMPP domain for the MUC

Config.Name: XMPP_RECORDER_DOMAIN
Config.Description: Domain for the jibri recorder

Config.Name: ETHERPAD_URL_BASE
Config.Description: Set etherpad-lite URL

Config.Name: JIBRI_BREWERY_MUC
Config.Description: MUC name for the Jibri pool

Config.Name: JIBRI_PENDING_TIMEOUT
Config.Description: MUC connection timeout

Config.Name: JIBRI_XMPP_USER
Config.Description: Internal user for Jibri client connections.

Config.Name: JIBRI_XMPP_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Internal password for Jibri client connections.

Config.Name: JIBRI_RECORDER_USER
Config.Description: Internal recorder user for Jibri client connections

Config.Name: JIBRI_RECORDER_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Internal recorder password for Jibri client connections

Config.Name: ENABLE_RECORDING
Config.Description: Enable recording conference to local disk
